card.name: Ice Replica
card.description: Add an {{CARD:10|1}}, {{CARD:9|1}} and {{CARD:31|1}} to your hand.

description.now: Add an {{CARD:10|1}}, {{CARD:9|1}} and {{CARD:31|1}} to your hand.
description.prev: Add a copy of a non DT paralysed monster to your deck. If used on ally monster, add it to the top of your deck.
